nodes.text: Rogue One Adaptation 5 is the fifth, penultimate issue of the canon comic book miniseries Star Wars: Rogue One Adaptation, which adapts the 2016 film of the same name. The issue was written by Jody Houser, illustrated by Emilio Laiso, and published on August 2, 2017 by Marvel Comics.

The Star Wars story continues! Rogue One, the small rebel crew comprising Jyn Erso and friends, has arrived on Scarif! But much danger lays in the path between the rebels and the Death Star plans - Including never-before-seen moments!
